content.detailedDescription: I was jogging in the street at night when i saw a bright orange oval shaped object moving steadily through the sky right above the tree line.  it made no noise.  it was moving steadily (about the speed of an aircraft seen from far away), but then it slowed down for a little while, then sped up again, then slowed down again.  it then stopped and hovered in the same place above the tree line.  after maybe 20 seconds, it then slowly and steadily got smaller and smaller in shape until it was a pinpoint and then too small to see anymore (in other words, at least from my perspective, it disappeared).  the whole event took about 2 minutes, i would say.  also, right about the same time the object started to decrease in size, some fireworks started going off in the neighborhood nearby (it was new year's eve).  i described the event to a friend of mine who is a pilot, and he said it could only be described as a ufo.
content.summary: Bright orange oval shape moving steadily through sky above trees, then slowed down, then sped up, then slowed, then stopped and hovered, then slowly got smaller and smaller in shape until it was too small to see anymore.

content.detailedDescription:

content.detailedDescription:
Me and the wife stepped out to have a smoke when i noticed a weird diamond shape or long centered thick oval slowly drifting smooth. i said hey look at thats weird. she said where? and soon after it started slowly vanishing as if it was entering an invisible tunnel. and we didn't see it again. there were no cloud cover and no trees this high up. 

this isn't our first ufo  sighting so we aren't shocked anymore, lol.
content.summary: White glowing ufo

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 8:17 p.M.(tonight - february 2, 2012  - i spotted 5 very bright white lights with a smaller red flashing light above each, heading in a south westerly direction.  at first sighting, they seemed to be in a diamond pattern with a tail, as they continued to move further away, the formation turned to a y.   by this time it was 8:22 pm.   then i glanced to my right (west) and spotted one brilliant white light.  at that time i decided to grab my telescope.  this brilliant white light remained stationery and constant; and was about 1,000 ft. above a mountain range approx. 9-10 miles from my residence.  i continued to view it both with the telescope and with my naked eye.  through the scope it appeared to have red/blue and white light emitting.  after approximately 18 minutes, it began to descend slowly and within 3 minutes it had dropped below the treeline.
content.summary: At approx. 8:17 p.M.(tonight - february 2, 2012  - i spotted 5 very bright white lights with a smaller red flashing light above each, heading in a south westerly direction.  at first sighting, they seemed to be in a diamond pattern with a tail, as they co

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 8:17 p.M.(tonight - february 2, 2012  - i spotted 5 very bright white lights with a smaller red flashing light above each, heading in a south westerly direction.  at first sighting, they seemed to be in a diamond pattern with a tail, as they continued to move further away, the formation turned to a y.   by this time it was 8:22 pm.   then i glanced to my right (west) and spotted one brilliant white light.  at that time i decided to grab my telescope.  this brilliant white light remained stationery and constant; and was about 1,000 ft. above a mountain range approx. 9-10 miles from my residence.  i continued to view it both with the telescope and with my naked eye.  through the scope it appeared to have red/blue and white light emitting.  after approximately 18 minutes, it began to descend slowly and within 3 minutes it had dropped below the treeline.

content.detailedDescription: it was a bright cold unusal mild non snowy night. looking into the western sky at what i thought was a star, and out from behind came another star and it did a "smily" or half circle and then went right back into or behind the big white star. it was so very high up that all it looked like was bright stars. though stars do not move like that, nor do comets. it lasted 1 to 2 minutes. i stood and watched it for a while till i got cold and went inside.
content.summary: Starlike bright white

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house smoking a cig when i noticed a light that first looked like venus or jupiter in the sowtheastern sky. after a few seconds of observation i noticed it was an amber orb hovering in sky, after hovering for a few seconds the ufo started across the sky in a zig zag motion before stoping in the east and taking off again into night sky. i live next to an airport and can without a doubt say that it was no airplane, helicopter, satellite,or balloon. i can honestly say i have no idea what i witnessed, and as excited i was to have witnessed it my first emotional responce was fear. i did everything i could not to wake up eveyone in the house to verify it... perhaps i should have.
content.summary: Amber orb hovering in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on 36 between bainbridge and greencastle heading towards danville. i looked up in the sky and saw a very bright light. i thought to myself that was a bight light then noticed it wasnt moving. so then i was think it must be on top of a tower. then the closer i got i kept looking for the tower and realize there no tower. i look back up at the light and it changes shape. the bottom part went ito a point like a diamond the top stayed round. then on each side a small round spark shot out slowly at a arch. i was going to pull over to try to record it on my phone but there was a card behind me. so i went up a little bit and turned around on a side road. it took 10-20 sec. when i got turned around looked up in the area it was and it was gone.
content.summary: Round bright light , then turned into like a iceream cone , where the bottom was pointed and top was round.

content.detailedDescription: At sharp spring park in smyrna tn on february 3rd 2012 at between 2:05 and 2:10pm. it was a warm bright sunny cloudless deep blue sky. i saw an unusual looking object as i exited my car to go walking. at first i thought it was a balloon that perhaps an elementary school nearby had released. it got my attention because it was flying in an unusual pattern. it would hoover than it would go slow and then it would move quickly. as i stared at it i could see a blinking white to yellowish light. it went behind some trees so i moved to get a better look. then another one appeared of the same type and description flying in the same direction. seconds later a third one appeared and they were then all traveling at a high rate of speed. suddenly from west there appeared a whole swam of objects with flashing light. they were all white and flying at a high rate of speed. they had rapidly flashing lights and almost looked like a swarm of birds because of the chaotic pattern or grouping of objects. they went from directly overhead to over the horizon in about 6 seconds or less. they were not planes or birds. i was amazed because i have never seen anything like this except for the films of ufo sightings in mexico where you have a large swarm of objects. i tried to shoot a picture with my iphone but was too nervous to get a shot off in time. it was absolutely amazing. i go to the local airshow all of the time in smyrna and i have never seen anything close to what i saw. the swarm of objects were a cluster of about 11 to 14 objects traveling in a group and heading i think west. i'm not good with directions.
content.summary: Weird shape almost like barbell appendage-multiple objects

content.detailedDescription:
I had taken my dog out into the backyard. while following him around the side of the house i heard a propeller plane overhead. being someone who likes to observe aircraft (and the sky in general), i looked up to catch a glimpse. upon doing so i immediately saw what i thought was the plane. but after maybe 2-3 seconds i realized that something was "off": i could not make out any real shape or features. and if this was the case, as i began to tell myself, then that would mean that the plane was too far away to be heard. therefore, the sound must be coming from another source. as this was dawning on me, the sound had moved from directly overhead to slightly behind me. this allowed me to effectively trace the sound back to the real plane, and, like on any normal day, i could make out its shape and a few features/colors as it flew away towards the south.

turning back to the object i had first spotted, i began to realize that it was a little odd in comparison to what one normally sees or indeed expects to see in the sky. for one thing, it seemed solidly white. not bright white, but not dull either. just...White. (note: it was not reflective.) also, it seemed to be..."gliding". there was almost a grace to its flight as it seemed to periodically bank left and right. it was during these subtle maneuvers that the object revealed its only discernible feature: it appeared to have a sharp point in the "front". this is to say that the object seemed to converge into a point at its front, much like a hang glider. (note: while its true that (due most likely to distance) i couldnt make out any real shape or features, its no less true that i could tell what the object was not. it was not for example an orb or a triangle or a disc, etc. at best, as far as i could see, it was a "line" that, as it appeared to bank left and right a few times (perhaps 2-3 times), seemed to have a pointy front like a hang glider.)

having come up with the image of a hang glider, i still struggled with the idea of the object actually being a hang glider. the reasons for this are as follows: 

1. the sighting took place in elk grove, california, smack dab in the middle of the central valley. this means that the nearest mountain where it could have been launched from was what, 20 miles or more away? so unless it was launched from a plane (and ive never heard of such a thing), i have no idea how it would be gliding over elk grove unless it had traveled for what seems like an exorbitant distance.

2. while it evoked an image of a hang glider, it didnt really look (or act) like one. there was no obvious sign of a person suspended underneath, it didnt spiral or swoop or appear to change altitude. it simply flew, at what seemed to be a fairly high speed, on a relatively straight heading towards the northeast.

3. as mentioned above, the object appeared to be moving pretty fast. it also appeared to be at a significantly higher altitude than the plane. and even at this perceived altitude it appeared to be moving at a higher velocity. this means that it either really was moving faster than the plane, or that it was much lower (and closer) than i thought, and simply appeared faster. the latter seems less likely however, because if it were true then i should have been able to make out more about the object in terms of shape, color, features, etc. 

i thought then that perhaps it was a helium balloon. but again, it didnt look or act like the potential explanation it evoked. balloons tend to wobble and float this way and that, and they certainly dont move faster than propeller planes, even on windy days. and today, the day in question, there was very little wind. and of course the object most certainly did not wobble or otherwise act like a balloon in any way. and there is also the not exactly small matter of it moving swiftly and consistently in one direction.

so i observed the object for about 2 minutes, after which time i lost sight of it over my house. i then proceeded to tend to my dog, all the while running various possibilities and such through my head. once done with the dog, i went through my house and out onto the street to try and catch another glimpse. alas, it was no longer visible. i can only assume that my estimation of its speed was correct and that in the couple of minutes that i was busy with my dog it had traveled far enough away so as to be obscured from view by the houses across the street.

in conclusion:

-observed a flying white object for approx 2 mins that looked like an indistinct "line". object appeared to bank softly to the left & right 2-3 times, which seemed to reveal a pointed front, similar to a hang glider. (note: object did not otherwise look like a hang glider.)

-object appeared to be at least 500 ft in the air. appeared significantly higher in altitude than propeller plane which was concurrently in the sky.

-object appeared to be moving faster than the aforementioned plane.

-aside from the soft banking, object appeared to maintain altitude and most certainly maintained a general direction of ne.

-object showed no characteristics consistent with what i would expect a balloon to exhibit.

-object made no discernible noise, released no discernible emissions, had no discernible lights/features/coloration (other than its white appearance), and reflected no light.

-object appeared to under intelligent control.
content.summary: White; no easily discernible shape or features; might have had sharp point located on

content.detailedDescription: It was in mid daylight i was pulling into my neighborhood and noticed a light that seemed like a star would look at night. it was too close to be an airplane, and too far to be a helicopter. i stared at it and noticed the color of it was reddish and had lights on it. it hovered but also moved slowly around that part of sky for a minute, leaving no trail like an airplane. it was a circular shape. i turned into neighborhood keeping my eyes on it the whole time. i took my eyes off to get out of car to look at it and it was gone. no trails left no sight of it. in a split second it had just disappeared. in mid daylight i saw thing object, it appeared to be just looking around watching moving slowly and then it vanished in the two seconds i took my eyes of of it. i went to grab my phone to take a video recording and my phone was dead,
content.summary: Redish color, spot light type thing which seemed to be in my direction shinning then not, hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the deck at 5:00 am. i had woken up because of some bad dreams. i was smoking and looking at a triangle constellation.  i noticed that the security light in the neighbors back yard was turned off which was strange. it had stayed on all night for years. i then saw 3 round lights between the openings in the trees in the neighbor���s back yards. they were mid-sized maple trees and the lights were at the top of the trees. about 30 feet high. just a little higher than the telephone pole. these lights turned on and off. they did this 3 times. i watched them from 5:15 am to 5:30 am. they were bright enough that they should have illuminate the house but didn���t. they were floating not moving at all. these objects were the size of a car. all three were the same size. about 6 to 7 feet in diameter. they were about half an acre or 100 feet away.

the next thing i know is it is about 6:40 am. i can���t account for the missing time. i���m not sure what happened during the previous hour and 10 minutes.  at a quarter to 7 i heard jet engines. the sun was just coming up. i saw 2 air force jets flying close enough i could see the pilots head and shoulders. i was shocked that they didn���t hit the trees because they were so low. they were going slow enough that both pilots looked at me. the jets were blue and silver or some dark color. i���m not sure of the color because i was looking at the pilots. my husband was sleeping when this happened. i should have been afraid but wasn���t. i was confused that i was not afraid. i waited to see if the jets would come back till 7:00 am. she saw movement over by the leland cypress tree. i saw what looked like a mirage in the shape of an oval.  the oval then moved very slowly over head.  as the object moved away the morning sunlight hit the bottom of the object and i could see a second oval under the bigger one. it made the metal of the object look like copper. i told my husband that night about what had happened.
content.summary: Around 5 am saw 3 lights less then 100 feet away, about the size of a car. then at 7:00 am 2 fighter jets pass by just before an oval/copper object went 20 feet over head.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my front porch about 9:30 pm looking toward the south/southwest and suddenly 2 craft popped up over the horizon in formation, at approximately 10,000 feet moving very slowly toward the northeast. they both had strange lights that were orange and red, i guessed the shape to be somewhat triangular. they were moving much slower than any aircraft i have ever seen and i had 31 years of service between the us navy and department of defense and have seen many aircraft in my day. the only aircraft i have ever seen moving that slow have been helicopters and these were not helicopters! the light pulsated in an unusual fashion. i watched them as they moved almost directly over my house and proceded to the northeast. then a second pair exactly like the first popped up over the horizon in the exact same location as the first pair and passed in the exact same direction. i asked my wife to come out and see and she was somewhat amazed. i continued to follow the 2nd set of craft as they moved to the northeast and by the time they were beyond my house the 1st set vanished and a few minutes later the 2nd set vanished, abruptly. the entire event took approximately 10-12 minutes. as i stated, there was absolutely no sound and i find that highly unusual for craft of this size and at that altitude to make no noise. skies were very clear and we have excellent views of stars. i've never seen a ufo but i do believe they are out there and i do believe that these were ufo's.
content.summary: 2 sets of 2 ufo's popped up over horizon immediately about 4 minutes apart, flew very slowly moving ne, approx 10,000 feet, absolutley no sound, very strange lights

content.detailedDescription: During a blizzard in 2008-09 (can't really remember) i drove to downtown chatfield. i was a block east of main street parked on the street when i saw bright lights coming from the west into town. i knew the airports were shutdown during the blizzard and i thought maybe the mayo one helicopter was trying to do an emergency landing. the object got closer and closer. it looked like it was going to crash near me so i got out of my car to get out of the way. amazingly there was absolutely no sound. as it came closer i could see through the wind and snow that it was triangular in shape with lights on all 3 corners. the object stopped just on the west side of town a few blocks from me, hovered, and then abruptly turned and headed back west very quickly. i was absolutely stunned and couldn't believe what i had just seen.
content.summary: Sited rectangular-shaped space ship

content.detailedDescription:
This is not the first time i have noticed a ufo but was amazed at this encounter.
i had come home from a local bar hanging out with some friends around 2:30 started watching a movie when i got in and when it was over headed twords my bedroom to go lay down. thats when i noticed a very bright light moving across the sky very fast and then it just shot upward and vanished. it was just above 3rd and south st in philadelphia. i  checked the news and even youtube to see if anyone had witnessed what i saw
 but there were no reports...
content.summary: Ufo spotted over center city philadelphia (south street) which seem to be flying west and suddenly just blasted up and out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
Travelling on beeline hwy, going west. (7:30 pm 2-1-12) saw one object in the east. ( we were 9 miles from ocean but it seemed that object was over the water). it was stationary, at about 80 degree angle....But appeared to be dancing, changing shape, then regrouping.  kept watching silently.  realized it was not a blimp or helicopter.  looked to my left, and saw another similar or
possibly the same configuration over the north county airport. same
 actiivity......Thought we saw another color...Looked like a ribbon on the end of a wand....Dancers use....Making a sideway figure eight...But then it became one "star" again.  called nc airport when we arrived home...Got recording.  it closes at dark. only used by small planes and helicopters.
hesitated calling sheriff, or newspaper.  they deny everything anyway.
content.summary: Two distinct objects in two sectors of sky.....Both same or similar.

content.detailedDescription: I went to let the dog out and noticed that there were some unusual lights hovering over lake michigan , these lights were white , red and blue, they would go from white to red to blue and then no lights for a few seconds and then the sequence would repeat. this object stayed stationary for 25 mins in the same spot . i live near the lake and am used to airline traffic and see planes ofthen but this was not a plane and i dont see any planes stay in the same spot for that length of time . not sure what i saw but know that it was not a plane .
content.summary: Strange lights hovering over lake michigan

content.detailedDescription:
This is still in my mind to this day, so i wanted to find out how to report it, which led me here. shape similar x-47b drone, although device would just hover with no sound like stationary in the air and was flat black like a stealth bomber.

we were in fear after shortley, and trained a scoped winchester sportsman .30-06 deer rifle on the object, and fired 3 succesive shots center mass at the object, with no obvious effect, or ricochet sound. man with me fired two slugs from a mossberg 12 gauge shotgun center mass, also with no effect.

we started to take off running through the woods, and the object pivoted direction and seem to float/hover north. i don not know where it went after, and never saw it again.
content.summary: Discharged .30-06 rifle and 12 ga. deer slug at device with no apparent effect.

content.detailedDescription:
Ero in cucina con la mia famiglia, finestre aperte e tapparelle abbassate, era estate.
abbiamo sentito forti vibrazioni e un rumore strano. subito dopo abbiamo osservato dalle tapparelle una luce intensa. abbiamo poi sollevato le tapparelle ma l'oggetto era gi��� sparito. mio cugino che abitava nello stesso palazzo ��� salito sulla terrazza dove si poteva osservare il cielo a 360 gradi ma l'oggetto era gi��� sparito.
i quotidiani locali hanno riportato la notizia. l'oggetto ��� stato avvistato in tutta la sardegna.

i was in the kitchen with my family, open windows and shutters closed, it was summer.
we heard a strange noise and heavy vibration. soon after we saw a bright light from the blinds. we then raised the blinds, but the object was gone. my cousin who lived in the same building went up on the terrace where could watch the sky at 360 degrees but the object was gone.
local newspapers reported the news. the object was spotted all over sardinian island.
content.summary: Rumori, vibrazioni forti, luce intensa. elmas primi anni novanta. noise, strong  vibration, bright light. elmas early nineties.

content.detailedDescription:
Rona parking lot forget exact time anywhere from 1900 to 2100. noticed first 1 then 2 orbs coming from direction of mountains (ene/inland) maybe 1.5-3 km off. let's just say i like watching the sky. ride came, got in car. thought were planes at first, but no beacons/red+green directional lights. constant source w/ a little flickering from either pattern too far away to see or atmosphere. not chinese lanterns as going estimated 30-120 klicks* in wrong direction for wind (7-12km/h). but i digress. drove first n to lougheed hwy, then e along lougheed for some 700m as crow flies, then object cloaks almost directly overhead. seeing as about 750m-1.2km above, and cloud cover about 6000m above... also, first object had cloaked while i was behind some branches, almost in exact same spot. total time i observed was about 3-4 min. almost seemed like they were on patrol, almost lazily moving in generally straight path, then cloaking in same area.

*based on degree of arc/unit of time, so 5-10��� in 3s and about 700m-1.2km** high. small plane stalls about 75km/h, so may or may not have been going right speed for plane... but no federally mandated lights!?

**based on triangulated diam of last orb i saw, perhaps 4.1m across. these things follow me everywhere, even in photos i took in greece.

say hi to ufo hunters for me and ask them why u no make more episodes. want to see analysis of non-fake dome of the rock ufo footage (hint: the fake one is where the woman from tennessee speaks).
content.summary: 2 reddish-orangy orbs heading wsw

content.detailedDescription: This day for me personally was a day of thriving and defeating obstacles.  i was on foot from a friends home heading homeward.  sun had set.  i was passing through the enfield town green, and stopped at the fountain in front of our town hall to sit as i do often here.  i looked skyward into a clear cloudless sky.  most immediately i saw a "star" shift, and watched close.  it stayed still for a short time, and then streaked spacebound or i think.  what i saw was a brief flash of light in shape of a line, then nothing.  from my view, the line was approx 500 ft. i continued my walk home.  stopping as routine at the veterans memorial on the town green.  i circled the memorial leaving 4 signs i burned into wood at the base of the memorial.  "poverty's end"  "building world"  and "community".  leaving a childs size leather coat in red white and blue on the flagpost i then found a place to sit.  my focus now up, i see three or maybe more of the same starlike objects, it seemed as if they were patrolling the town green.  i watched for possibly one half hour but i wasnt thinking in digital time so i may be inaccurate.  i continue on and watched them as i walked the last mile home.  they seemed to follow me i cant be sure, but it felt like it.  i then had a brief jolt of fear shoot through me.  then thought this is ok, you will sleep tonight and wake tomorrow.  i gave a last glance skyward as i opened the door.  bumping my chest in a sign of respect, i went to my room and thrived.  i have to add this:  i do not remember many dreams after being involved in a head on collision.  this night i remember vividly what i saw in my sleep.  i will only say here, three things were most prominent:   nature  flight   and time.
content.summary: Star like.  blended with stars to perfection.

content.detailedDescription: Triangular two long sides rear was shorter. gray in color. lights each corner and center, row of lights accross the rear . low close and very easy to see the details. moved sort of like a boat when turning. the lights change configuration several times. the triangular shape never changed, but the arangement of the lights would change and could easily fool someone into thinking it was a large plane or several planes in formation.  not your typical sighting, everthing was close, clear and detailed. could easily be something military. i was in traffic when my wife spotted it. we were watching it as we drove. it lasted atleast several minutes. i lost sight of it due to traffic.
content.summary: Triangular gray ufo with changing light configurations.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving church in tyler, tx and made a detour to flint, tx to run an errand and was leaving flint, tx on hwy 346 heading west toward noonday,tx. i noticed a large yellow-orange orb or ball of light in the sky to the west of me as i was traveling west on hwy 346.  it appeared to be hovering like a star but it was not the color of a star of planet which is a bright white color, this thing is a yellow-orange color.  i watched it off and on as i was driving and would lose sight of it due to being behind trees and houses, etc. it was still in the sky to the west of me when i reached hwy 155 to turn left to go to noonday.  while in noonday, i turned left to head towards home and saw it again in the sky straight ahead which was west and i was going west so it was straight ahead.  it looked like it was still about 45-50 degrees in the sky at that time but it looked like it was going further away from my position.  i went to the marina to get a better look and hopefully take a picture of it but by the time i got to the marina, the yellow-orange ball was too far away to show up in my camera.  it had moved accross the lake and even further than that until it was just a little orange spec in the sky above the horizon.  the sighting started while driving at around 8:20pm and continued until just after 8:30pm when i lost sight of the orange ball.  it was going west when i saw it last.  i am dissapointed that i didnt get any pictures this time like i did last time.  the orange ball didnt linger around the lake like it did before on 01-01-12.
content.summary: Yellow-orange orb/with pulsating lights hovering-moving slowly over horizon

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Driving north bound on ih 35 -cibolo, tx --
 toward austin tx description: ���large ball of fire traveling at fast speed , appeared to be descending ���into the atmosphere -- then suddenly shot diagonally  and disappeared into the sky!!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I was sound asleep and awakened with sharp pain in left knee and femoral area of left hip. did not see anyone, sounds or lights - just pain in left leg and ugly purple bruises. husband was asleep in his chair and dog asleep in doorway.  i think something grabbed my legs and roughly moved me.
i am a 75 year old retired health professional.
content.summary: Awakened with sharp pain in left knee and femoral area of left hip. two large fingerprints on lower abd area and 3 larger fingerprints on left calf. right forearm has two much smaller fingerprints and back of right ankle one large finger print.

content.detailedDescription: When i look the sea, i'm saw very lights in the sky and the sea, i don't think he was fishermen bot are much and very incadecent
content.summary: Light in the sea and the sky

content.detailedDescription: Note:  witness is a mufon field investigator and star team member. driving pick-up truck home from work at 7:55 pm on wednesday, feb. 1, 2012, traveling north on hwy 281, passing between the exits for brook hollow and thousand oaks, facing due north, when suddenly a very large and extremely bright white "fireball" with a long yellow tail streaked into view passing directly in front of me from west to east and descending at a very shallow angle. the object was close enough that i could make out some detail in the long yellow tail behind it which looked like flames. from my viewpoint, the object appeared to be just beyond loop 1604 and paralleling the loop from west to east. loop 1604 was about a mile north of my position when the object came into view. the object was about the size of a penny when my hand is held at arms length with the thumb and index finger extended. the object appeared to be very low, maybe 800 feet of altitude and was descending at a very shallow angle of about one unit down for every ten units forward. it was traveling at a very high rate of speed, much faster than the commercial air traffic that is common in this area as these jets set up for landing at san antonio international about three miles to the south of my position when i first saw it. i estimate that it was within my field of vision for about 7 seconds before it passed out of view behind buildings to my right. my first impression was that it was a very bright meteor and i kept expecting it to burn out, but it did not lose any intensity while within my view. my next impression was that it was so bright that it looked like burning magnesium, but did not have any other colors associated with it other than the flaming yellow tail. my last impression was that i fully expected to come around the buildings and see that it had hit the ground somewhere between hwy 281 and universal city about 7 - 8 miles to the east. i drove up to the interchange at 1604 and 281 and watched to the east for a few minutes but did not see any sign of the object or a possible impact. i called 911 to report this incident because i expect that this object had to have hit the ground somewhere to the east of 281 unless it burned up immediately after passing out of my view.
content.summary: Bright white light with long yellow trail streaked w to e descending toward universal city, tx.

content.detailedDescription: Step out front door facing north at 6:30am cst, note bright object traveling west, orange glowing orb, movement erratic. sky was clear overhead and the stars were clearly visible...Observed object for 4 minutes until it disappeared in clouds to the west. unable to determine altitude. clouds to the west were displaying "heat" lightening and i would guess approximately 20 miles distant.
content.summary: Orange glowing orb observed moving in westerly direction

content.detailedDescription:
Glowing light with tail traveling west to east in a straight line for 30 secs! it appeared to break up or burn up to my east and break into pieces. my estimate that it was first observed from my ground observation west of carrollton, tx and broke up over garland,tx. started at 25 degrees to the west on horizon, past directly overhead and ended 30 degrees from the east horizon.

definitely the largest meteor i have ever seen lasting (to my eyes)30 secs and glowing red hot than exploding and going out. most have been a huge meteor to last that long and make it so low into the atmosphere.
content.summary: Large fireball lasting 30 secs

content.detailedDescription: Driving down the draper road and noticed the lights higher in the sky.  they looked still and i thought they were from a tower because it looked still.  it caught my attention because we have no tower where i saw the lights.  as i got closer to the lights they went in front of the car at about tree level and i could tell they were moving.  i stopped the car at draper and harvey road and rolled down the window to take a picture.  i listened for a sound and was amazed that there was no sound coming from them.  i followed them up into the driveway on harvey road.  it went over the ridge behind our house and disappeared. the sighting left me in awe.
content.summary: Driving and noticed lights from a distance.  got closer and took a picture.
